sql-statement.sql: SELECT t1.*,t2.username,t3.username FROM (SELECT * FROM user_info_history WHERE userid=?) t1 INNER JOIN `user` t2 ON t1.userid=t2.id INNER JOIN admin t3 ON t1.checkuser=t3.id

select t1.id,t2.username,t1.companyname,t1.contact,t1.contactphone,t1.publicaccount,t1.licence,t1.idcard,t1.safety,t1.ispass,t3.username as checkuser,t1.checktime,t1.remark from user_info_history t1 inner join `user` t2 on t1.userid=t2.id inner join admin t3 on t1.checkuser=t3.id where t1.id=?
